title: How to Make Latholemono (Oil and Lemon Dressing)

steps.headline: Pour the ingredients into a mixing bowl.
Beat together using a fork or whisk.
steps.description: Alternatively, if it's easier, pour everything into a clean screw-top jar, pop the lid on and shake.

steps.headline: Serve.
steps.description: This is best served over hot vegetables or room temperature vegetables. It can also be used as a dressing brushed over fish, shellfish, lamb, or chicken when grilling.

text: Pour the ingredients into a mixing bowl.  Beat together using a fork or whisk. Alternatively, if it's easier, pour everything into a clean screw-top jar, pop the lid on and shake. Serve. This is best served over hot vegetables or room temperature vegetables. It can also be used as a dressing brushed over fish, shellfish, lamb, or chicken when grilling.
